titlestmt.titleproper: Latin American Painting Photograph Collection of the Arts Library, Yale University
The Photograph Collection of the Arts Library, Yale University

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Wednesday May 1, 2019 at 23:00

did.abstract: Collection of mounted black and white and color reproductions of Latin American paintings. Content varies from original photographic prints to reproductions from magazines and other published sources. Some sections have accompanying clippings folders.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright has not been transferred to Yale University. Further use of this material may be subject to the copyright laws of the United States (Title 17, United States Code), or to site license or other rights management terms or conditions.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Latin American Painting Photogaph Collection, Arts Library, Yale University

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: These materials are stored offsite at the Library Shelving Facility. For access to the materials, please make a request at the Art & Architecture Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Organized by individual artist name. The individual artist material is further divided primarily by location of work. The individual artist portion is preceded by an Anonymous grouping arranged chronologically.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Collection of mounted black and white and color reproductions of Dutch paintings. Content varies from original photographic prints to reproductions from magazines and other published sources. Some sections have accompanying clippings folders.

scopecontent.p: Includes a folder of miscellaneous clippings.
